quotes.quote: To a profound pessimist about life, being in danger is not depressing.
Profound subject matter can be encompassed in small space - for proof, look at any sonnet by Shakespeare!
Simplicity of character is the natural result of profound thought.
The opposite of a correct statement is a false statement. But the opposite of a profound truth may well be another profound truth.
The most profound statements are often said in silence.
Profound thinkers either become astute lovers or rebellious spirit.
The most profound joy has more of gravity than of gaiety in it.

Isn't it the moment of most profound doubt that gives birth to new certainties? Perhaps hopelessness is the very soil that nourishes human hope; perhaps one could never find sense in life without first experiencing its absurdity.
Profound changes in ones life do not always come from sledgehammer. They can just easily come from a whisper.
All profound truths startle you in the first announcement.
The profound thinker always suspects that he is superficial.
A profound conviction raises a man above the feeling of ridicule.
Every profound spirit needs a mask: even more, around every profound spirit a mask is continually growing.
Dreams are often most profound when they seem the most crazy.
Sometimes the simplest things are the most profound.
Clarity is the counterbalance of profound thoughts.
You cannot learn a lesson of profound forgiveness unless you understand what it is to be wounded and forgive that which has wounded you.
Profound optimism is always on the side of the tortured.
The most profound things are inexpressible.
The deeper thought is, the taller it becomes.
Some things scratch the surface while others strike at your soul.
Good sense is at the bottom of everything: virtue, genius, wit, talent and taste.
Genius might be the ability to say a profound thing in a simple way.
You can have brilliant ideas, but if you can't get them across, your ideas won't get you anywhere.
The obscure we see eventually. The completely obvious, it seems, takes longer.
